entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
